Details: Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.

Companion can only use Strike and Block, gets two weapons of their own. Uses Expertise and Presence for the attacks instead, target special defense. Spend 1 essence to grant Companion 1 AP. Companion AP reset to 0 at end of turn. Max three times per turn.
The first time each turn that you use the Shift action, regain 1 AP.
If you and your companion attack same target in a turn, second attack has advantage if from opposite range category.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
Remove an additional stack of each ailment from yourself at the end of each turn.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
Start of turn, can choose companion, host or neither. Chosen has advantage on all attacks, other has disadvantage.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
